remarks: The mapping from fiducial co-atom ` w ` to its set of lattice dilations.  (Contributed by NM, 11-May-2012.)
statement:
ldilset.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
ldilset.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
ldilset.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
ldilset.i $e |- I = ( LAut ` K ) $.
ldilfset $p |- ( K e. C -> ( LDil ` K ) = ( w e. H |-> { f e. I | A. x e. B ( x .<_ w -> ( f ` x ) = x ) } ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d H w $.
$d I f $.
$d K f w x $.
